a sweet, cold dish consisting of cream mixed with sugar, white wine, and sometimes the white (= clear part) of an egg: Place the fruit in the bottom of your serving dish and top with the syllabub and some flaked almonds. Keep the syllabubs in a cool place until you are ready to serve them. The sillabubs were made with lemon zest and served in sillabub glasses.
Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
